about_the_game:
FARM FOR A WIFE

is a light farming simulation game about Everett, a man who's fallen in love and needs to prove himself to his future father-in-law through hard work on the farm. The love of your life is waiting for you to earn her father's blessing. Her mother on the other hand wants to help you along, giving you seedlings to start on the farm. Along the way, all of the townspeople start giving you tasks to help you grow even further and prove him wrong! FARM FOR YOUR WIFE!

Place plots, plant, grow, harvest, and sell your goods, all spread your farm out wide.
Upgrade your house to get more space and give your wife a suitable place to live.
Complete tasks for the town to earn bonuses and extra rewards.
Upgrade your tools at the blacksmith to become even more efficient at your farming life.
Earn your father-in-law's blessing and get your gal!
